response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 by you, and I'm confident it will provide substantial returns on investment. Considering this, I propose a special introductory offer of $11,000 for you. This is a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at an attractive price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 11000}
